short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sets video quality automatically to the highest res avaliable

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Video Quality Checker is a Chrome extension designed to elevate your online video streaming. In the world of ever-expanding online content, it's crucial that your video quality matches your screen resolution. This extension automatically detects the quality of YouTube videos as you click to play them. If the quality falls short of your screen's capabilities, Video Quality Checker will change the quality for you to the maximum allowed resolution.
